review_title: VSO THE TOP ONE THIRD OF THE BEST INGO EMPLOYERS
pros: One of the best INGOs to work for; Good with staff development; You work with minimal supervision; You have support from the global VSO; You work in goals; You learn from your work;
cons: Sometimes ambition is shot down;  You manage an entire programme with a host of partners to work with; volunteer numbers matter a lot to VSO and any shortfalls can land you in trouble; Volunteers are the biggest critique of your work and VSO listens more to them than to you!
